def_en: If you describe something as ostentatious, you disapprove of it because it is expensive and is intended to impress people.

def_cn: （人）炫耀的，夸示的，卖弄的
def_en: If you describe someone as ostentatious, you disapprove of them because they want to impress people with their wealth or importance.

def_cn: （动作或行为）招摇的，显眼的，引人注目的
def_en: You can describe an action or behaviour as ostentatious when it is done in an exaggerated way to attract people's attention.
